alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Champaign; Hardin; Logan; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 5:54AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN SHELBY, NORTHERN CHAMPAIGN, LOGAN, EAST CENTRAL AUGLAIZE AND SOUTHWESTERN HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM EDT... At 554 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Belle Center, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Bellefontaine, Wapakoneta, West Liberty, Jackson Center, Russells Point, De Graff, Lakeview, Belle Center, Chippewa Park, Northwood, Quincy, Rushsylvania, Huntsville, Port Jefferson, Ridgeway, Valley Hi, Zanesfield, Fryburg, Montra, and New Jerusalem. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 109 and 111. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
